sourcesContent:
import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
import { useColorModeValue } from "@chakra-ui/color-mode";
import {
  FormErrorMessage,
  FormLabel,
  FormControl,
  Input,
  Button,
  Textarea,
  Stack,
  Box,
  Center,
  Flex,
  Heading,
  HStack,
  VStack,
  Radio,
  RadioGroup,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { useMediaQuery } from "@chakra-ui/media-query";
const ActorForm = () => {
  const { handleSubmit } = useForm();
  const onSubmit = (data) => console.log(data);
  const color = useColorModeValue("gray.100", "gray.700");
  const [isLargeScreen] = useMediaQuery("(min-width: 600px)");
  return (
    <Flex height="2xl" alignItems="center" justifyContent="center">
      <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
        <Box
          bgColor={color}
          p={8}
          maxWidth="4xl"
          borderWidth={1}
          borderRadius={8}
          boxShadow="lg"
        >
          <Stack direction="column" spacing={4} rounded={6}>
            <Heading size="lg">Add Actor & Actress</Heading>

            <FormControl id="name" isRequired>
              <FormLabel>Name</FormLabel>
              <Input
                placeholder="First and Last name"
                focusBorderColor="teal.500"
              />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl id="dob">
              <FormLabel>Date Of Birth</FormLabel>
              <Input type="date" size="md" focusBorderColor="teal.500" />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl id="movie">
              <FormLabel>Movie</FormLabel>
              <Input
                placeholder="Movie's Title"
                size="md"
                focusBorderColor="teal.500"
              />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl id="nationality">
              <FormLabel>Nationality</FormLabel>
              <Input
                placeholder="E.g.: American.."
                size="md"
                focusBorderColor="teal.500"
              />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl id="gender">
              <FormLabel>Gender</FormLabel>
              <RadioGroup defaultValue="2" colorScheme="teal.500">
                <Stack spacing={5} direction="row">
                  <Radio value="m">Male</Radio>
                  <Radio value="f">Female</Radio>
                </Stack>
              </RadioGroup>
            </FormControl>
          </Stack>
        </Box>
      </form>
    </Flex>
  );
};

export default ActorForm;
